name: The Gate of Hyrule
description: The Princess has been abducted by Ganondorf and Hyrule finds itself in danger. Using an old and powerful artifact, you go on an adventure, towards Hyrule's Castle.

name: The Trials of the Seven Sages
description: In order to defeat Ganon, you need to gain power. Go and reclaim the blessing of the Sages.

name: The Majora's Mask
description: The wizard Agahnim attacked and teleported you in the world of Termina, a strange place threatened by a Falling Moon.

name: Defeat Ganon
description: The barrier around the Hyrule Castle was broken by the fairies of Termina. Go and save the Princess.

name: Open the Gate
description: Turn on the Gate to unlock its powers.

name: Gear up
description: Find the items and tools you'll need for your adventure

name: The camp in the forest
description: Build your fire camp for the night.

name: The Skull Kid problem
description: Find and kill the Skull Kid that lure the travellers inside the forest

name: Rauru's simple calculator
description: Solve Rauru's mathematical problems.

name: Let me in, Saria
description: Unlock Saria's door

name: Make the difference with Darunia
description: Resolve Darunia's riddle

name: Ruto's game of word
description: Find the secrets word in Ruto's poem

name: Impa's repository cleaning
description: Help Impa to keep the repositories of Hyrule clean and tidy

name: Nabooru's spectral links
description: Enchant the files with Nabooru's dark magic

name: Zelda's Amiibo
description: Build a statue of Zelda for future oracles

name: Song of Time
description: Rewind the time to avoid a precarious situation

name: Sun's Song
description: Use your space-time magic to the next level

name: The time before doom
description: Estimate in how many days the moon will fall

name: Toward the moon
description: Defeat Skull Kid

name: The Castle
description: Vanquish Ganon's generals and reach the submit of the Castle
